about_the_game:
This DLC is a donation intended for those who wish to provide additional support to the developer of Snail Trek. It contains no gameplay changes or additional game content, except:

  • Each of the snails wears a funny hat (toggle this ability in the options menu). You can change hats by typing 'change hat'.
  • It also adds a secret option to the snails' computer rewarding you for your patronage.
